mhs:Descriptive.mh:Title: Winners FIFA BEST Awards
mhs:Descriptive.mh:Description:
[Juergen Klopp, Megan Rapinoe and Lionel Messi win awards in Milano]?
Juergen Klopp wins coach of the year, Megan Rapinoe best female player, Lionel Messi best male player and Jill Ellis best female coach at the FIFA BEST awards.
?-Vs of BEST award exteriors
?-Kylian Mbapp\xc3\xa9 exiting ceremony
?-WS Sari Van Veenendaal
?SOUNDBITE (English) Virgil Van Dyke:""
?-Jill Ellis exiting ceremony
?SOUNDBITE (German) Juergen Klopp: "The curse seems lifted, as of now things go only in the right direction. We will see. It was a very successful year for us. This is great but as i said on stage, if Maurizio (Pochettino) had won that final than someone else would be lifting this trophy. Well now I have it, so is life. This is not something I would ever have expected, not when I finished school, not when I finished my studies. This is a special moment"
?-Lionel Messi exiting ceremony hastily
?SOUNDBITE (English) Megan Rapinoe:""
?-MS Lucy Bronze
?SOUNDBITE (English) Luka Modric:""
?-WS of La Scala theater with award
Opnamelocatie: MilanoITALYEUROPE
